post.title: 나, 개, 세계적으로 유명한 악취 전문가이자 나의 주인들이 나를 단지 착한 여자로만 보는 것은 모욕적이야
post.content:
## 여성이 STEM 분야에서 느끼는 것 ![image 0](/assets/img/2024-05-16-IDogAmaWorld-FamousOdorologistandItsInsultingMyHumansOnlySeeMeasaGoodGirl_0.png) ![image 1](/assets/img/2024-05-16-IDogAmaWorld-FamousOdorologistandItsInsultingMyHumansOnlySeeMeasaGoodGirl_1.png) ![image 2](/assets/img/2024-05-16-IDogAmaWorld-FamousOdorologistandItsInsultingMyHumansOnlySeeMeasaGoodGirl_2.png)

She can be found talking about 19th century dogs and other weird old stuff on Instagram and Twitter @KelliHuggins, and kellihuggins.com.
